transcript:
Customer: Par ko bulaiye.
Customer: [inaudible] khichdi hai.
Customer: Kya?
Customer: Papa ne kisko aatha.
Customer: Bulaiye use.
Customer: [inaudible] Parveen.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Satte sir good afternoon Vasundhara bol rahi IndiaMART se senior manager.
Customer: Hmm boliye.
Executive: Sir wo apni services chal rahi hai end date pe thi like isko karai nahi process sir kar lete hai process.
Customer: Kar dijiye apna paisa deke kar dijiye koi baat nahi.
Executive: Sir kya dikkat aa rahi hai bataiye to. Achcha khasa itne time purana online.
Customer: Aap aap mere se baat ki hai pehle?
Executive: Sir aapse pehle bhi to kitni baar baat kar chuki hu mai.
Customer: Kya bola mai?
Executive: Sir abhi kuch din pehle aapne reply kya tha.
Customer: Sir aapke yaha koi.
Customer: Mere sath baat kiye the kya aap?
Executive: Aapse mai to accounting se baat kar rahi hu waise aapke jo account manager hai Anshika unse aapki baat hui thi.
Customer: Madam mera mera question wo nahi hai. Mai kuch mera question ye hai mere sath aapke sath mane aapka kabhi baat hua hai is beech?
Executive: Sir meri aapse abhi is beech ko nahi baat hui hai aapke office me kisi se baat hui thi unhone bataya tha ki aap father ko leke kahi hospital wagera gaye hai bas yahi bataya tha.
Customer: Are madam mai aap khamokham lingering kare mai jo question puch raha hu usko wo baat kijiye na.
Executive: Sir meri aapse nahi baat hui.
Customer: Mere sath baat hua nahi to mai already bata raha hu aapko mai aur service continue karna nahi chahta hu. Thik hai?
Customer: Iske regarding aur mujhe phone mat kijiye.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Sir bata to dijiye kya dikkat kya hai kya problem hai kyu nahi renew karana chahte?
Customer: Kya nahi hai wo mujhe pata nahi mai actually dekhiye IndiaMART se duniya bhar ka phone aa raha hai mai kitne baar kisko kitna baar bolu.
Customer: Aaj subah kisi ne phone kiya tha unko bhi wahi same baat bol rahi. Fir aap mujhe mujhe phone kar rahe hai wo dusra koi phone karega kitna kis kisko kisko jawab de hum log kam karenge na aapke sath baat karenge ek sath ek word me bol diya hum I am not interested to continue okay?
Executive: Sir but mujhe bataiye to kya kahi service me dikkat hai kya problem hai iski wajah se aap.
Customer: Pata nahi sir aap apna paisa deke kar denge kya?
Customer: Apna paisa deke kar denge kya? Service ke liye sir.
Executive: Sir jab tak aap baat nahi karoge jab tak aap batayenge nahi baat kaise pata chalega kya issue hai kya dikkat hai?
Customer: Mai I am not interested to continue this service.
Executive: Sir kya business nahi mil raha IndiaMART pe jiski wajah se aap nahi continue karana chah rahe?
Customer: Fir fir kyu aage kyu ja rahe mera kuch kam hai yaar aap phone mat kijiye aur.
Executive: Kya sir?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer does not want to continue service.

- Receiving too many calls from IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive asked the reason for not continuing.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Annoyed



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, renewal, calls
